meanings.definition: A marine coelenterate of the class Scyphozoa, including the jellyfishes.
meanings.sent1: The scyphozoan gracefully glided through the ocean waters.
meanings.sent2: I saw a scyphozoan while snorkeling in the sea.
meanings.sent3: The scyphozoan decided to throw a jellyfish party under the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as fluid and mesmerizing as a scyphozoan in the deep sea.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the vibrant colors of the scyphozoan.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of scyphozoans.
meanings.sent1: The scyphozoan habitat provided a perfect environment for jellyfish.
meanings.sent2: Her artwork was inspired by the scyphozoan creatures she studied.
meanings.sent3: The scyphozoan dance moves at the party were quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The scyphozoan sky was filled with glowing stars on that magical night.
meanings.sent5: The scyphozoan patterns on her dress shimmered in the sunlight.
